channel.title: !door help!
channel.description:
ok i have a door in my working castle wars wich i followed the dragon-history creators guide to doing. but the side doors that are supposed to open without attacking them wont open. ill list the co ords if some can make me something for them to open
heres the door.cfg that i have,thats all that i have for this door. door = 2384 3134 4467 -2 0 -2 1 0
this is the side door which ur supposed to exit the iner area
